title: Lord of the Rings | Symbolism of the Ring of Power
description:
We all intuitively feel that the ring of power on LOTR is intuitively right as a magic object, but what binds its aspects together to make it so fascinating?  Why is it a ring, why does it make invisible, why does it participate in a dark hierarchy of power?

The video was edited by Thomas Wijnaendts van Resandt from the Storytellers channel. (CHANNEL LINK: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbphDfwSJmxk1Ny_3Oicrng)

My links:  

Support: https://thesymbolicworld.com/support/
Subscribestart: https://www.subscribestar.com/jonathan-pageau
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

The podcast: https://soundcloud.com/jonathan-pageau-307491252
website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicW...
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan

My website designers,  Anomalist Design: https://www.anomalistdesign.com/

The music at the opening is Russian Eastern Overture, by Rimsky Korsakov.
